titleStmt.title: The declaration and resolution of the countie of Leicester. Delivered in answer to to [sic] His Majesties speech, made to the whole county. Wherin they expresse their zeal and loyalty to His Majesty and also their unchangeable constancie to maintain the proceedings of Parliament against all opposition. Also the protestation of the county of Lincoln, delivered to the Lords, by the Lord Willoughby of Parham, and by a message communicated to the House of Commons, and by them approved of. Also the Parliaments charge and command to all iustices. Ordered, that this be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsing. Cler. Parl. D. Com.

The declaration and resolution of the countie of Leicester. Delivered in answer to to [sic] His Majesties speech, made to the whole county. Wherin they expresse their zeal and loyalty to His Majesty and also their unchangeable constancie to maintain the proceedings of Parliament against all opposition. Also the protestation of the county of Lincoln, delivered to the Lords, by the Lord Willoughby of Parham, and by a message communicated to the House of Commons, and by them approved of. Also the Parliaments charge and command to all iustices. Ordered, that this be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsing. Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Willoughby of Parham, Francis Willoughby, Baron, 1613?-1666.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
